mapper.select: /* SQL_id = gameNomal.cmmn.FNL1002.selectGameInfo */ SELECT MC_IDNO , MC_NAME , MC_MBID , MC_CDCODE , MC_LEVEL , MC_NOWHP , MC_NOWMP , MC_STR , MC_INT , MC_DEX , MC_CON , MC_GOLD , MC_IMGLOCATION , MC_IMGNAME , MC_DEL_YN , MC_USE_YN , #{mbIdno} AS MB_IDNO FROM FNL1002 WHERE MC_MBID = #{mbIdno}
